Achei o jogo excelente pra se jogar em call com os amigos, muito divertido, apesar da temática de terror, causa muitas emoções, um tanto de desespero às vezes, mas é uma experiência ótima e te prende por bastaaante tempo.

Game is pretty good, there are a few negatives, some survivors tend to tbag when close to the hatch, and some of the killers also camps around the body when caught. Tho most killers don't do that. Game can also be very enjoyable if you play custom games with friends or just survivor mode with them. Sure you can't play as killer and have friends play survivor in an online game with randoms but that prevents teaming between the killer and the survivors. Overall this is a really good game to play, especially with friends.

So there are possibly a few balance issues in that if you're new and the other players are not they will have a lot of perks you won't have and it might make the game harder for you.  That being said, it is still fun and even with low levels and no perks on my killers I can often kill survivors with tons of perks, so you can earn points to level up your killers even in those cases.  Once you get a character high level you should probably play as them for max points, I'm not being that smart so I just play the new chars as I want to get a feel for them, and then when I add the perks it almost feels like lowering the difficulty level.

yeah i recommeeeeeeeeeeeeeeend this game, is a nice game lol but you need to play this game with breaks, in 400 hrs i make 2 long breaks lol...this community is toxic as hell and if you are playing killer in low ranks don't exist a "gg" if you kill them, u baby killer omg, if u let one escape he say ez, and 90% of people who stun you are going to t bag you, if you play survivor solo, u are going to be...mad af, sometimes can give you rank 1 survivor and GOOD SURVIVORS but this is so rare, in normal matches it give you rank 20 and the people don't unhook you, don't help you, farm you, not all the games are the same, but i think i got farmed like 50 matches ngl, but ds help you a lot, soooooooooo, this game its good, buuuut the comunity is toxic af, so, idk,  i can't recommend this game 100% if you are going to play solo, if you are going to play with friends, its fun.
